title: EisnerAmper's Weinstein: Tax Reform To Accelerate Deals (Audio)
itunes:title: EisnerAmper's Weinstein: Tax Reform To Accelerate Deals (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Charly Weinstein, CEO of EisnerAmper, on the company's upcoming private equity summit, and the potential impact for real estate tax reform.
